GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Resolve NULL ptr dereference after an ELS LOGO is aborted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit eea34ce23dc3a595695856dc73bb132a9c5a2902. For more details please see the references link.
